title: Originality and the Future of Copyright in an Age of Generative AI. (arXiv:2309.13055v1 [cs.CY])
abstract: This papers explores the question of human authorship when works are created with generative AI tools.
context:
Title: Originality and the Future of Copyright in an Age of Generative AI. (arXiv:2309.13055v1 [cs.CY])
Abstract: This papers explores the question of human authorship when works are created with generative AI tools.
translated_title: 原创性与生成式人工智能时代版权的未来
translated_abstract: 本文探讨了当作品通过生成式人工智能工具创建时，人类创作权的问题。
tldr: 生成式人工智能工具创作的作品引发了关于人类创作权的问题。
